text: unkalil cilar tam manaiviyarait"taykal" enak kurivitukinranar, atanal avarkal ivarkalutaitaiya taykal" (akivituvatu) illai ivarkalaip perretuttavarkal tam ivarkalutaiya taykal avarkal - eninum, niccayamaka ivarkal collil verukkattakkataiyum, poyyanataiyume kurukirarkal - anal niccayamaka allah mikavum poruppavan, mikavum mannippavan
